sub_rules.content: Each time a new block or block-like construct is opened, the indent increases by two spaces. The indent level applies to both code and comments throughout the block.
sub_rules.formalization:
E0 := block-like construct
E1 := The Line Before E0 Opens
MANDATORY: QUANTITY(E0.Indentation, =, E1.Indentation + 2)

sub_rules.content: When the block ends, the indent returns to the previous indent level. The indent level applies to both code and comments throughout the block.
sub_rules.formalization:
E0 := block-like construct
E2 := The Line After E0 Ends
MANDATORY: QUANTITY(E2.Indentation, =, E0.Indentation - 2)
